Judul: The write stuff: How to produce a first-class paper that will get published,  stand out from the crowd and pull in plenty of readers.
Abstrak:
Manuscripts may have a rigidly defined  structure, but there’s still room to tell 
a compelling story — one that clearly  communicates the science and is a pleasure to 
read. Scientist-authors and editors debate the importance and meaning of creativity and 
offer tips on how to write a top paper
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
